## getters() function

Returns a map of all of the column getters for a table.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getters(table: ColumnTable): Record<string, (i: number) => any>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  table | ColumnTable |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
